reqs:
All students are required to complete a placement interview prior to registration. For upcoming interview dates and further information, please go to our website at www.asia.ubc.ca to view under "Placement exams". Classes are to be held in the Asian Library.
"WAITLISTS: To sign on to the waitlist for this course, please go to http://waitinglist.ubccjk.com/"
Registering for this section does not mean you are enrolled in the course, this is a waitlist section. Students will be moved off the waitlist into the course automatically once there is space. For more information including our department priority guidelines please see: http://www.asia.ubc.ca/undergraduate/department-wait-lists/
courseName: Supervised Study in the Korean Language - SPRV STDY KORN
description: Primarily for students in Asian Studies and Linguistics.
